comments.snippet:
Hi Bakiba

Does this issue happen as well when you use mstsc to connect to the Jump System or not? To me it looks like as if TMDS just tries to block an outgoing RDP session which was generated when a user is connected through RDP, and as soon as the initial connection is supended TMDS let's the connection happen.

This might be solely Trend Micro's fault and I expect it to have nothing to do that you use mRemoteNG to connect to the Jump System (prove me wrong). I suggest you contact your se...
